Section 26, Lecture 251

package demopack;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class collectiondemo {

public static void main(String[] args) { 
// TODO Auto-generated method stub

int a[] ={ 4,5,5,5,4,6,6,9,4}; 
// Print unique number from the list- Amazon  
//print the string in reverse ArrayList<Integer>ab =new ArrayList<Integer>(); 
for(int i=0;i<a.length;i++) { 
int k=0; if(!ab.contains(a[i])) { 
ab.add(a[i]); k++; 
for(int j=i+1;j<a.length;j++) { 
if(a[i]==a[j]) { k++; 
} 
} 
// System.out.println(a[i]); 
//System.out.println(k); 
if(k==1) System.out.println(a[i]+"is unique number"); 
} 
} 
}

}
